entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
